question: I'm 33 weeks pregnant and just got diagnosed with gestational diabetes about 2 weeks ago.  So far I've gotten good blood sugar readings since meeting with the dietician.  I've done alot to cut back on sweets and change my eating habits.  Anyone have any goods suggestions for low carb meal ideas?  I'm also a little worried with the holidays coming soon and all the food I'll be surrounded by, that I might have trouble sticking to a good diet.
title: gestational diabetes
